U8 – Count=4 (impacts={4,3}, likelihoods={4,3}) → two sentences; first=impact-first (river[4,4]), second=source-first (coastal[3,3]).
U9 – Three distinct pairs ⇒ three sentences; ordered by impact then likelihood (river[4,4] → coastal[3, 2] → ground[2,2]).
U10 – Four distinct pairs ⇒ four sentences; verify fallback source order river→sea→surface→ground after impact/likelihood ordering.
U11 – Impact-first precedence: group [4,3] (river+coastal+ground) in sentence 1; [2,4] (surface) as source-first sentence 2.

public_forecast.english_forecast: TEST: Public 5 Day Forecast English TodayEK.
public_forecast.england_forecast:
TEST: Public 5 Day Forecast English. Regression test data at: 2022-07-18T21:44:39Z 
The forecast flood risk across England for today and the next four days is very low.

Local flooding is possible from rivers and surface water in parts of the north on Tuesday and Wednesday.

Elsewhere, in the north and north-west on Tuesday and Wednesday, local flooding is possible but not expected from rivers and surface water.

Land, roads and some properties may flood and there may be travel disruption.
